comment: Welcome back Hannah . Interesting article worthy of a read by all . I believe in the power of a free press & that mainstream media should be part of the Sussexes comm s strategy . But , the royal rota system is broken & the contract should be renegotiated . <URL>

comment: Royal Rota or no Royal Rota , the press will still write stories about the Sussex s . I understand why they say that but I don t think it will really change anything . If the papers want to spin a story they will just take the info off the Instagram page
